readable.title: 897406883_f09f673d94
readable.content: A child pulls another in a small wagon . A toddler in a red jacket and jeans pulling another toddler wearing a green hat and jacket and red paints in a red wagon . A toddler in dirty jeans attampts to pull a younger child in a wagon . A young boy pulls another boy wearing a silly hat in a radio flyer wagon . One child pulls another , sitting in a red wagon , along the sand .
